title: 1999/706/EC: Commission Decision of 30 September 1999 fixing the amounts available in 1999 under the special framework of assistance for traditional ACP suppliers of bananas (Council Regulation (EC) No 856/1999) (notified under document number C(1999) 3097)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 30 September 1999
fixing the amounts available in 1999 under the special framework of assistance for traditional ACP suppliers of bananas (Council Regulation (EC) No 856/1999)
(notified under document number C(1999) 3097)
(1999/706/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amount of funds available to each traditional ACP supplier will be those as listed in the Annex to this Decision. These are indicative amounts and do not represent a commitment to the ACP traditional supplier concerned.

The Member responsible for Development is authorised, on behalf of the Commission, to reallocate the amounts set down in the Annex to this Decision in compliance with the provisions laid down in Article 7 of Regulation (EC) No 1609/1999.

The Member responsible for Development is authorised to sign, on behalf of the Commission, a financing agreement with each traditional ACP supplier on the precise level of funds to be allocated, on the basis of an annual action plan of investments.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 September 1999.
For the Commission
Poul NIELSON
Member of the Commission
